As someone stated, click GridGamelauncherc wait until it loads up, click to play and windows live pops up. click create a new profile and scroll down and click the link at the very bottom ( its in bold like links usually are ) to create an OFFLINE profile. Guys! It's simple!
1 -You mount the image... (use Virtual Clone Drive)
2- Install the game!
3- Open the game folder and then open the paste caled "crack".
4 - Copy all the contents of the folder to Win32Live (Programmes, Disney Interactive Studios, Binaries, Win32Live)
5 - Then you open the App "Gridgamelauncher" and it should appear the guy in the light cicle... you wait and then the game starts!!!

( For those who have the serial problem... don't extract the game... mount it!  AND YOU MUST COPY THE "CRACK" CONTENTS TO WIN32LIVE... If you don't it will continue to ask for the serial...!!! )
